name: Space Hunter (Le Don)
description:
Space Hunter is a stealth game, in which the player is hunted by an AI. It was made by myself in GameMaker 2 with soundeffects made in Bfxr for the AI and Games Jam 2021 with the theme

BREAKING THE RULES

The 4 rules of the Hunter:

1. One Hunter is hunting you

2. The Hunter will forget your location, when you're out of sight

3. The Hunter can hear your sprint, when you're close to the Hunter

4. You can kill the Hunter with 5 shots

Controls:

WASD to move

Control: Lock direction

Shift:   Sprint

Space:   Shoot

And some additional rules:

- The Hunter reacts to your shots

- You can only sprint for a limited time

- You are safe at the starting points, but you can't shoot
